NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
MEMO:
TO : The NAEB Officers
FROM: NAEB Hdq.
RE : Attached mailing list.
Attached please find a copy of our latest raaiMng list, ^his list shows
by the code letter which are active members, associates, affiliates,
subscribers, or complimentary and exchange persons.
As time goes on we will send you additions and corrections to this list.
We hope this will help you accomplish your NAEB tasks with more ease.
